titleStmt.title: The love-sick shepheard, or, The dying lovers reprieve the shepheard for a nimph doth pine away, who with unkindness doth his love repay, till hearing of his plaint, she doth at last, afford him comfort for his sorrows past, tune of Long days of absence, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Burton at the Horshoo in West-Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Right half sheet contains: "the second part to the same une [sic]."
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
